alert.note: Alert for Escambia Coastal; Escambia Inland; Okaloosa Coastal; Okaloosa Inland; Santa Rosa Coastal; Santa Rosa Inland (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued February 25 at 8:47PM EST until February 26 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM CST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...Portions of southwest Alabama, northwest Florida and southeast Mississippi. * WHEN...Until 9 AM CST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Areas of dense fog will initially develop along the beaches and immediate coast this evening before gradually spreading into southern portions of southeast Mississippi, far southwest Alabama, and the western Florida panhandle late tonight. Fog is expected to lift across most areas away from the immediate coast by 9 AM CST Sunday morning.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.
